page.title: 12The Methodist chapel,Hook
page.content: The{Wesleyan Chapel}in{Hook}was built in the year 1874.It is built with red bricks and the windows are arched.It is quite large.Inside the{Chapel}the seats are all box pews.In the olden days people had to pay every year for a seat for the family.There used to be seats in upstairs{Gallery}but these have been taken out.There is an {electric organ}in the{Chapel}but not too many years ago it had to be pumped by hand.A boy was paid the sum of {13 shillings(65p)}a year to do the pumping. At the front of the {Chapel is the{Altar}table and behind this the {Pulpit.}The{Font}is rather small and stands on a table at the side of the {Chapel}when there is a christening it is placed on the { {Altar.}The {Chapel}is in the{Goole {Circuit}and is looked after by the {Rev.Fisher. }
